text: Vigla (, "watch, lookout") may refer to: ; Locations in Greece * The highest peak of Mount Kerkis on the island of Samos * Vigla, Arta, a village in the Arta (regional unit) * Vigla (ski resort), a ski resort near Florina * Mikri Vigla, a small village on the island of Naxos famed for its nearby beaches * Kaki Vigla, a small village on the island of Salamis ; Other * Vigla (tagma), a Byzantine cavalry unit
title: Vigla
